desc: Chateau de Chic is a full service salon + spa featuring services for hair, skincare, nails, waxing and spray tanning. Our licensed professionals are here to deliver top of the line services, whether you need a cut + color, facial, pedicure, bridal services and more! Book your appointment today by calling 507-346-2922.

layout.text: Shed the layers of winter. Image Skincare can help! New products for smoother, brighter, healthier skin! Check out Image's Exfoliating Solutions!
